name: DRAGON'S CLIMBER
description:
-The best score is HERE -

Dragon's Climber was created in one week for the DreamArcade GameJam 2020.

Dragon's Climber is a vertical platformer. Will you be able to reach the top?

3 Modes are available:

  • story mode, for beginners
  • infinite climb, for veterans
  • 2 player versus: trigger traps and jump faster than your opponent!

Good luck !

CONTROLS :

(You can play with a gamepad, player 1 take the first gamepad detected and player 2 the second, GamePad button1 for jump and 2 for cancel).

PLAYER 1 : WASD to move and SPACE to jump (C to cancel in input name menu).

PLAYER 2 : ARROW to MOVE and ctrl to jump (shift to cancel).

F to toggle FULLSCREEN mode on windows version.

CREDITS :

- Programming, Game Design, Level Design by Joqlepecheur.

- Graphics, Artworks, Sound Design, and additionnal programming by Robowarrior.

(Beautifull princess picture from PIXABAY).
